infos.title: Queen of Shackles
infos.characteristics: [Children of the Queen] increases the ATK and DEF of the boss greatly per each minion summoned. Magic heroes with AOE spells are advantageous in this stage.

1.name: Desert Stinger
1.description: Fire a Poison Stinger at a random enemy, dealing M.DMG and M.DoT. Also summon 3 scorpions.

2.name: Venom Absorption
2.description: Absorb poison from the nearby area. Upon taking P.DMG, some DMG will be reflected as well as Petrifying the aggressor for 5 sec. After absorption ends, create a shockwave that deals M.DMG and knocks over nearby enemies for 3 sec.

3.name: Petrification Venom
3.description: Injects poison into the enemy furthest away dealing M.DMG. After injection is complete. Petrify said enemy for 5 sec.

4.name: Children of the Queen
4.description: Increase ATK and DEF greatly based off the number of surviving scorpions.

5.name: Purify
5.description: Every 30 sec, remove all negative effects and increase ATK SPD.
